result.error.detailedDescription: Configuration of this protection policy cannot be completed because an error occurred on the application agent host.
result.error.reason: Unable to configure the policy because of an error on the application agent.
result.error.remediation:
To resolve this issue:
1. Delete the files in the following directories:
On Windows, \INSTALL_DIR\AGENTSERVICECONFIG.
On Linux and AIX, /opt/dpsapps/agentsvc/config.
2. In the PowerProtect Data Manager UI, go to Protection > Protection Policies, select this policy, and click Set Lockbox.
If the issue persists, contact Dell Customer Support.
asset.name: Test_DB_001
host.name: exchange.demo.local
protectionPolicy.name: Exchange Backups - TEST PLC

result.error.detailedDescription: Monitoring of this session cannot be completed because of an unknown error occurred during monitoring.
result.error.reason: Exchange Backups - TEST PLC: Unable to monitor backup/restore session of MICROSOFT_EXCHANGE_DATABASE asset Test_DB_003 in host exchange.demo.local because of an unknown error. The backup/restore session might be running on the client.
result.error.remediation: Monitor the next few jobs and please ensure network connectivity between agent and PowerProtect Data Manager has no issues and all the services of PowerProtect Data Manager are up and running.
